section.title: XML Schemas
section.para:
In all methods XML-data is used as input and output. The related XML-schemas are located in
http://www.escidoc.de/schemas/rest/content-relation/0.1 http://www.escidoc.de/schemas/soap/content-relation/0.1

These XSDs are used:
content-relation.xsd content-relation-list.xsd
